execution_quality: Poor - the agent committed all changes together despite the follow-up instruction requiring separate commits with individual changelogs, necessitating immediate course correction.
work_category: Git commit operation where the agent was asked to commit changes, then immediately asked to split commits with separate changelogs instead.
summary: The agent attempted to commit changes but created a single monolithic commit when the user's follow-up clarified that separate commits with individual changelogs were required. This represents a significant alignment gap where the agent failed to anticipate or handle the refinement properly, requiring immediate rework to meet the actual specification.
follow_up_pattern: User redirected the agent to redo the work with proper separation and documentation, indicating the first attempt didn't meet requirements.
